thread:
The paper introduces a telescoping model for analyzing deep learning phenomena, enabling insights into grokking, gradient boosting, and weight averaging by approximating neural network training dynamics with linearized functional updates #AI #DeepLearning
 Link: https://arxiv.org/abs/2411.00247
The model's complexity metrics highlight non-monotonic curves tied to diverging train-test complexity. #DeepLearning #GradientBoosting
Machine learning's gradient dynamics shape model effectiveness. 🧠🚀 #AI #Learning
